workspace.heading: No Workspace Found

workspace.inviteTeammatesDescription: Create a team and add members to it.
workspace.linkToWorkspace: Share the link with the team.
workspace.description: Collaboration made easy with a workspace to share images and videos instantly.

install.clickRightSideExtension: Click the extension icon on the right side of the address bar to start using this tool.
install.belowScreenShotButton: Or, click the button below to take a screenshot right now!
install.remainPinned: To make accessing the extension easier, please keep it pinned by following the steps below.
install.clickPuzzle: Click the puzzle icon next to your profile.
install.clickRec: In the drop-down menu, find Rec.
install.clickPin: Click the pushpin icon until it turns blue.
install.pinnedDescription: Thanks for adding our extension! To get the most out of this service, staying signed in is strongly recommended. Keep your screenshots synced across all devices. Access and share them anywhere, anytime.

image.uploadThumbnailDescription: Upload a logo or avatar for your workspace. Supports JPG or PNG format only.

video.noAccess: You don't have access to this item anymore.

chaptersSection.heading: Chapters

video.firstchapterstarts: The first chapter must start at 00:00.
video.allchaptercontents: All chapter contents must be filled.
video.minimumlengthof: The minimum length for a chapter is
video.addchapterdescription: To add a new chapter, move the video progress bar and click the 'Add Chapter' button.
video.chaptersDisabledDescription: Your setting for showing chapters is disabled. Your chapters will not be shown if you share this video. To enable it, please go to More Options in the Manage tab.
video.chaptersCriteriaDescription: Your video does not meet the chapters criteria because it is too short. The minimum required video length is {{length}} seconds.

deleteAll.message: Do you want to delete all items forever?

restoreAll.message: Do you want to restore all items?

integrations.gladYouHere: We are glad you are here!
integrations.installSlack: Install the Slack app in your workspace. Once the Rec app is installed, you can send screenshots and videos to any Slack channel or user.

googleDrive.title: Google Drive Integration
googleDrive.description: You can connect your Google Drive account to save screenshots and videos captured by Rec.
googleDrive.disconnectErrorDescription: Are you sure you want to disable the Google Drive integration? By disconnecting, you won't be able to sync your screenshots.

dropbox.title: Dropbox Service
dropbox.description: You can connect your Dropbox account to save screenshots captured by Rec.
dropbox.disconnectErrorDescription: Are you sure you want to disable the Dropbox integration? By disconnecting, you won't be able to sync your screenshots.
dropbox.connectDropbox: You can connect your Dropbox account to save screenshots captured by Rec.

jira.title: Jira Service
jira.description: You can connect your Jira account to add new tickets and upload screenshots captured by Rec.
jira.disconnectErrorDescription: Are you sure you want to disable the Jira integration? By disconnecting, you won't be able to sync your screenshots.

slack.title: Slack Integration
slack.description: You are successfully connected to Slack. Now you can share your screenshots with your workspace.
slack.signedWorkspace: You're signed in to the Slack workspace:
slack.slackWorkspace: You're signed in to the Slack workspace:
slack.connectedSlack: You can connect your Slack workspace account to share screenshots and videos captured by Rec.
slack.disconnectErrorDescription: Are you sure you want to disable the Slack integration? By disconnecting, you won't be able to share your screenshots and videos.

trello.title: Trello Service
trello.description: You can connect your Trello account to add new tickets and upload screenshots captured by Rec.
trello.disconnectErrorDescription: Are you sure you want to disable the Trello integration? By disconnecting, you won't be able to sync your screenshots.
trello.connectedDescription: You can connect your Trello account to add new tickets and upload screenshots captured by Rec.

profile.title: Profile
profile.loggedInWithGoogle: Logged in with your Google account
profile.passwordValidation: Must contain at least eight characters and one number.

deleteAccountModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete your Rec account? Deleting your <1>{{email}}</1> account will permanently remove all your associated data, such as images, videos, folders, and creative spaces, including any content you have shared with others. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccountModal.privacy: For more information about how we treat your data, please see our Privacy Policy.
deleteAccountModal.confirm: To confirm, please type 'delete my account' below.

error.resetLinkExpired: Your reset link has already been used or has expired.
error.emailIncorrect: Please enter a valid email address.
error.minimumLength: Must be a minimum of eight characters and include at least one number.

common.googleRequire: Please sign in with your Google account to continue.

login.welcomeSubtitle: We are glad you are here!
login.welcomeDescription: To use our cloud-based services for sharing and saving your screenshots, please sign in to continue.

continueOptions.title: Or Continue with
continueOptions.playerSubmit: Submit it by Player at ease

videoSave.title: See New Features
videoSave.description: You can now save videos as GIF animations. Create funny memes to share with your friends.

newToolFeatures.title: We Added New Tool Features
newToolFeatures.description: You can now easily add text to your images, change border colors, adjust text alignment, and more!

chromeExtension.title: Add to Chrome
chromeExtension.subtitle: Save and Collaborate
chromeExtension.description: Save files to your preferred format and platform. Share with a single click.

folderOrganization.title: Move to Folder
folderOrganization.description: You can now organize your screenshot images into folders for easy access later.

pinToolbar.title: Pin Toolbar
pinToolbar.description: Dock our moveable toolbar on either side of the screen, or float it around any area of the screen.

trimbox.title: Trimbox
trimbox.description: Allows you to easily trim and cut your recordings.

setting.accountToBeRemoved: Please select the account to be removed.
setting.passwordBeforeRemove: Please enter your password before removing your account.

preference.alwaysGetLink: Always get shareable links for screenshots uploaded to Google Drive.
preference.saveEachFile: Ask where to save each file before downloading.
preference.saveEachFileDescription: Note: To use this feature, you need to allow the extension to manage downloads when the permission request window pops up. Also, only when this option is turned on can you specify a default subfolder to save screenshots to your local disk. It defaults to the Downloads folder if you don’t specify a subfolder.
preference.addDateAndUrl: Add date and URL to the top of a screenshot.
